amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Delaware River Main Channel deepening project by $7.7 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce general construction funding by $7,700,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 213 (Roll no. 391).
